scripts.concat: cat src/pool.js src/game.js src/gameobject.js src/scene.js vendor/easie.js src/shape.js src/emitter.js src/label.js src/button.js src/arcadia.js > dist/arcadia.js
scripts.compress: node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output dist/arcadia.min.js -- src/pool.js src/game.js src/gameobject.js src/scene.js vendor/easie.js src/shape.js src/emitter.js src/label.js src/button.js src/arcadia.js
scripts.build: npm run-script concat && npm run-script compress
